body_text: Nit: within Firefox, we tend to use prefixes (gFoo) or InitialCapsFoo for singletons like this. For consts, we use kFoo or ALL_CAPS (which you have done for DB_OPTIONS...), to help distinguish global and local variables. Up to you whether you want to follow suit or not (it's an add-on, so your code can kind of do what it likes in terms of style), but I thought I'd note it.
